Text: Anyone know what the extended cut adds over the theatrical release?

Thanks so much neon.  Very nice rip of a well-crafted film. V:10, A:10.  FYI, under Windows 7, the rendering in the latest VLC player viewed on a 40" LCD 1080p-capable Samsung screen is noticibly better than in Windows Media Player.
AC3 XviD Extended fills my needs. tick tack.

It is very interesting that I cannot play this file. I am not a noob, either. Both main file and preview are not playable in WMP, JetAudio, and VLC. If I didn't know any better I would say it was a fake, but it appears others can watch and uploader is trusted. Quite odd as this has never happened with a legit file for me.

Media info also cannot get any data from the files.

haha I am not noob but I make Noob Mistakes. Disreguard above comment please as file is fine... my brain is not, however. ;)
